article.title: Raytheon Receives $305 Million for Aviation Radio Technology
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: Raytheon Co., Fort Wayne, Ind., was awarded a $305 million firm-fixed-price contract to procure multi-mode aviation radio system components and services. The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Fort Monmouth, N.J., is the contracting activity.
